fields.name: ActiveActive
fields.description: ActiveActive flag.

fields.name: AdminState
fields.description: Property to indicate if the Express Route Gateway serves traffic when there are multiple Express Route Gateways in the vnet

fields.name: AllowRemoteVnetTraffic
fields.description: Configure this gateway to accept traffic from other Azure Virtual Networks. This configuration does not support connectivity to Azure Virtual WAN.

fields.name: AllowVirtualWanTraffic
fields.description: Configures this gateway to accept traffic from remote Virtual WAN networks.

fields.name: BgpSettings
fields.description: Virtual network gateway's BGP speaker settings.

fields.name: DisableIPSecReplayProtection
fields.description: disableIPSecReplayProtection flag.

fields.name: EnableBgp
fields.description: Whether BGP is enabled for this virtual network gateway or not.

fields.name: EnableBgpRouteTranslationForNat
fields.description: EnableBgpRouteTranslationForNat flag.

fields.name: EnableDnsForwarding
fields.description: Whether dns forwarding is enabled or not.

fields.name: EnablePrivateIPAddress
fields.description: Whether private IP needs to be enabled on this gateway for connections or not.

fields.name: GatewayType
fields.description: The type of this virtual network gateway.

fields.name: IPConfigurations
fields.description: IP configurations for virtual network gateway.

fields.name: InboundDnsForwardingEndpoint
fields.description: The IP address allocated by the gateway to which dns requests can be sent.

fields.name: NatRules
fields.description: NatRules for virtual network gateway.

fields.name: ResourceGuid
fields.description: The resource GUID property of the virtual network gateway resource.

fields.name: Sku
fields.description: The reference to the VirtualNetworkGatewaySku resource which represents the SKU selected for Virtual network gateway.

fields.name: VNetExtendedLocationResourceId
fields.description: Customer vnet resource id. VirtualNetworkGateway of type local gateway is associated with the customer vnet.

fields.name: VirtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups
fields.description: The reference to the VirtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroup resource which represents the available VirtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroup for the gateway.

fields.name: VpnClientConfiguration
fields.description: The reference to the VpnClientConfiguration resource which represents the P2S VpnClient configurations.

fields.name: VpnGatewayGeneration
fields.description: The generation for this VirtualNetworkGateway. Must be None if gatewayType is not VPN.

fields.name: VpnType
fields.description: The type of this virtual network gateway.
